评论详情: I really like the fit of these bras, I for two in different colors. The back design is cute too. All fits great. The material is nicer and thicker than a lot of other sports bras.
Very comfortable to use, not overly thick or heavy item, Great Hold and does not move or loosen, fit was great and loved the material

评论概述: The comfort of this sports bra is AMAZING!!!!
评论详情: There is absolutely nothing that I dislike about this sports bra!  Being a woman who loves animal prints I loved the black and gray leopard print on this bra. The straps are not uncomfortable and do not press into my shoulders making me uncomfortable, rather they just sit there comfortably. The bra itself, fits perfectly and curves where it needs to curve and is made of a thicker material—like a swimsuit-type material.  It is padded but not overly padded.  I am planning to purchase more of these sports bras in the future!!!!  This was an excellent price for a stylish and comfortable necessity piece.
It was very comfortable, super cute, and fit except for the bottom… it was to big/wide. If I worked out or ran in it… probably wouldn’t provide support so I just kept it and wear it for fashion only.

I train 6 days a week and my previous sports bras were getting loose and no longer gave me the support I needed. Normally these are something I prefer to try on in person and not just order with the thought of "I'll return them if they don't work out!". So glad that not only did I trust other reviews, but that they worked perfectly for me. I was reluctant on the support with a "Y" back, however it held the girls in place made me feel unrestricted in my movements and was very comfortable.  I normally wear a 36B bra so based on the chart and other reviews I decided to give the XL a try and it fit perfectly. Tight enough to give me the support, yet not too tight that I could not move comfortably in it. Especially looked nice in my racer back tank and the straps were hidden instead of the usual look I sport where you can see the sports bra straps under my tank. Definitely will be ordering more colors to replace what I have.

Loved the camo pattern and the back is so cute!! This bra is so supportive without being suffocating.  The fabric isn't as soft as a Vuori like fabric, but it gets softer with washing and for the money it's on par.  I would recommend! I'm a 36D and the Large fit perfect.

评论概述: Fits right, adorable design, but straps dig & pads fold and shift
评论详情: I like the color of this sports bra and the design is adorable. The fit is spot on and the support is light as expected. The only issues I have is the stupid padding shifts, folds, and is annoying when washed. The pads are also weirdly shaped like a shoulder pad from the 80s. The only reason I haven’t just pulled them out is because they seem to be nipple shields, but at this point I might just take my chances. The straps are thin and dig into my shoulders, but it’s kind of expected since I see it as more of a yoga bra than something that requires support. I wash it in the dryer and air dry it. I cycle through lots of sports bras because I work out daily and the running girl bras hold up well. They are my favorite brand right now. I have been replacing my old Victoria Secret sports bras with these as they get worn out.

I’m 125lbs, 5’3” and got a small. I like when my sports fit with firmness but not suffocating and it fits so perfectly!! It’s snug and holds everything together just how a sports bra should. The fabric isn’t itchy, it’s good quality, I’ve had it for a month now and it’s my go to bra. It stretches over just fine and it goes back into shape. It’s so easy to wear!

I bought a medium black camo sport bra. I like the pattern.  I am a 34DD, 125 pounds and it fits snug.  I took out the lining pads because they are really stiff.  It offers a lot of support.  The only thing for me is it is a bit short in the torso.  It does not come down much and fits right below the breast line.  I would prefer a little bit more fabric there.  But, it works.

I hate shopping for sports bras so was reluctant to get this and have to possibly return it. However, the reviews were good so I gave it a go and I'm so happy I did! The material is great, thick and very supportive. It looks good and doesn't squeeze anything out. The strappy back is a cute detail. Thinking I will get it in other colors it's that good. Happy with my buy:)

I'm a very small chested woman (30AA) so I didn't have high expectations. The front neckline is a little big on me but I also have nothing to fill it out. I'm also no help with rating support either 🤣 I quite literally just look for bras that are cute and have modesty padding and this one is great!

Great bra.  I was concerned about coverage when I took it out of the package, but it has a nice fit and feel.  The color is not a saturated navy, but rather more of a faded navy blue.  Size up if you’re on the cusp.  I’m a 38DD and the XL fits well.

评论概述: A great sports bra for big breasted women
评论详情: I love this bra the material is just great quality. It great for women will bigger breasts. I also love that it comes in a lot of different colors!
I really like this sports bra.  Very comfy and full coverage.  Not over priced - so good purchase for me.

评论概述: Great color and material is nice
评论详情: Overall fit is great, material is nice. The pads are a little stiff, so I removed those upon wear.

Super comfy, wash well. I have several colors and they are all over 1 yr at this point. No uni-boob like other sports bras. My only con is that the pads shift around throughout the day. I like the additional coverage so I don't want to remove them. Definitely recommend!
Runs slightly big should have got the XS
Comfy and flattering
These are great quality for the price, great support. Only negative is like most sports bras, I wish removable pads were sewn in.
The color and fit were perfect! I ended up seeing in the cup pads because it drives me crazy when they are removable.
Fits well and looks great.  Good value for the price.

Love it but had to return for one size smaller than recommended by amazon. Also, I am not a fan of tight clothes and I am an A cup. These last two things should be taken into consideration when finding the right size.

评论概述: Not as comfortable as I would have liked.
评论详情: This didn’t cover my back as well as some sports bras do. It will show back fat if you have it.
Good value for the money. Quality material.
Smoothes sides, great support. 5'7" 180lb C cup. I bought size XL. I will buy another!

I am 5’9 and 130lbs and avid runner. I am picky about fabric and stitching, I am picky about support (i want great support but not suffocating), I need a bra that fits around my rib cage (because i’m smaller) but gives me enough cup room. This bra does ALL OF THAT. It is so soft, so comfortable once you sweat (because sometimes the comfort changes as bras gets sweaty in a workout). I love the coverage - just the right amount as i prefer modest but not cover EVERYTHING. It comes with padding, but i take those out. Material is breathable, thick enough for coverage and has enough stretch for comfort.
I love these sports bras! I have about 5 of them now! Great support and comfort! Definitely would recommend!

These are as good as the popular brand.  Was happy with the fit, and quality.  Now will it last as long as the popular store brand, maybe not but at a fraction of the cost if I get 6 month, it's worth it.
Comfort Alert.  These fit great and are soooooo comfortable.  True to size.  Would buy again.
Slightly large
Ma gusta mucho mi top. Es el color que buscaba, verde pastel. Muy suave la tela y confortable, se ajusta muy buen.
Thinking of buying it in more colors!

I’m quite satisfied with this sports bra, especially for such an affordable price. The material seems a bit thicker and cottony than some other sports bras. I like how it is wider across the chest and lined with mesh (I think) which was more breathable. I got a M and it seems a bit big since I took the padding out, so I feel like I could’ve gotten an S too. Either way, I recommend!
It’s good but a little snug but I like it.

This material is very nice and seems like a great quality bra, however the sizing is weird. For reference I am typically a 38C. I ordered the large and the band was extremely tight but the cup fit great. Because of this it made huge side bulges. I am exchanging for a larger size to see if that helps.

The Sports Bras for Women offer a perfect blend of support and comfort for high-impact activities! 🏋️‍♀️ Designed with a sexy crisscross back and longline cut, this padded sports bra tank top provides maximum support while giving you a sleek, flattering look. Whether you’re hitting the gym, doing yoga, or going for a run, this bra ensures you stay comfortable and confident throughout your workout. A must-have for any active woman’s wardrobe! 🌟
Fit perfect for the mud run I was in!

评论概述: Good quality, good for high-impact workouts
评论详情: Very well made.  A bit minimizing, which I found I liked.  Keeps everything in place even if dancing or running.
Favorite sports bra ever! Looks adorable and has lasted quite a while unlike others. And has great support (much needed for a mom)
Great sports bra

I read the reviews before purchasing this sports bra & I ordered it having faith that the reviews were accurate. This bra has minimal support & I’m afraid I won’t be able to wear it during workouts. It’s okay for everyday but not for exercise.

These are so comfortable and supportive. The inner pads rarely shift and if they do they are easy to fix. I have also only had a pad come out one time in the dryer but it was super easy to put back in. I bought this in 2 other colors it’s that good.

I preferred a large based on sizing recommendations and other reviews recommendations but as you can see from the photos it's clearly too snug on me! I did end up keeping it because it's cute and I just started working out again so hopefully it will fit me soon!
I love this sports bra! It’s so cute with my backless workout shirt and it’s very comfortable too! Washes up great! I remove the boob pads and put it in a laundry bag and hang to dry.

I LOVE THIS BRA!!  It is the perfect sports bra if you ask me. The elastic bands in the back are stretchy enough that you don’t get stuck trying to get it on, even if you’re a little damp from your shower or something. Meanwhile the from is compressive enough to keep the girls in place without making you feel like you’re in a straight jacket. I also wear this with a couple of different backless tops I have. Flirty and flattering.
I have many sports bras but I do really like this one. It stays in place and fits well.

I really loved how this sports bra fit and how it held my chest in. I used it 1 day while walking/ jogging on the treadmill and one of the straps broke! Super bummed about that. I really had high hopes.

Honestly this bra has the support I need- I would say medium to high and it is perfect to wash and dry without any padding falling out. The material is good quality and the padding is the perfect thickness. Definitely worth the money spent! I wear this bra regularly for a labor demanding job

I bought this to shine in the glow for a glow run, and now it’s my favorite sports bra!  Super comfy, but is supportive and looks cute while working out.  But then eat part is that the bra pads don’t move around in the wash!  I’ll be buying some more 😊
Love this sports bra. It's comfortable and fits well.

评论概述: This was purchased for a gift for Christmas
评论详情: The price was right.
Good fit
This bra is comfortable for all day wear, fits great, and shipped fast!

I absolutely love this sports bra. However, it is not ideal for running and doesn't offer total support if you have big boobs. It is very cute and comfortable which is a plus. I mostly use it for hiking, yoga, gym, etc. But would not count on it for longer runs or running at all. I wear it all the time though just because it is comfortable and supportive, just not for running. It's interesting the name of the brand is running girl because this sports bra is not high impact. Also, I wish the straps were thicker and more supportive, but they are just two strings and can hurt your shoulders/neck/back sometimes because the weight is not distributed thoroughly.
Goid
Makes you want go out and start exercising! While looking good
Love this bra! Comfortable, great material and I love that the padding doesn’t fall out during the wash and it’s easy to adjust. Will buy more!

Love it and got it in 2 more colors. It's a great fit. Able to move around and it's not too tight. It's thick, but not too hot. Only thing I don't like is that the front goes up pretty high on the front of my armpits, so it's difficult to wear with some tank tops cuz it sticks out the sides. Love the variety of colors but wish more of them were black or darker on the inside vs white.
Worked great for daughter cheer uniform
I love that it's cute and that it didn't cost so much money.

I'm traditionally a 36DD and the Large is a bit tight, creating spillage over the top. I didn't return because it's a light weight bra and I plan on wearing around the house and for errands. The material is soft, the straps are easy to maneuver and the black color is rich.

Have tried many sports bras. This one is very comfortable, keeps the girls in place and is easy to get off(I’ve gotten stuck in others). The straps don’t dig and the sides are the right height so no side boob but not too high to rub. Great for working out!
I am not a large woman but had to get the large size to get these bras over my shoulders to take them off.
Extremely comfortable! The pads stay in place which is nice

I was looking for a sports bra that I could use for running that was comfortable and has good support for running. Most of the sports bra that I had tried tend to be a bit too small on the breast region. I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable this  sports bra is. I was able to fit into a medium and I am a 34 DD. I will be purchasing different colors.

Nice quality I love this style. I am on the slimmer/athletic side and always wear a medium. 34D has been my size for over 16 years. The medium fit at first but as the day went on the seams and areas around the armpit and shoulders were very tight. I had to take it off as I became sore. I gave these to my teen daughter who is about 12lbs less than I am and it fit her great with no aches or pains. So I would say these run just a little too much on the small side. Keep in mind if you have stronger arms and back that going up a size probably fixes the problem. Quick delivery, nice material, good price.

评论概述: Great fit! Thank goodness. Apologies for alien photo 👽.
评论详情: Sports bras and Bras in general are impossible. Sports bras 90% of the time run annoyingly Small. This is the first I’ve bought anywhere that is simply ‘true to size’. I’ve never purchased an XL sports bra and probably should have in the past. I’m 199-200lbs and 5’4”. I’m top heavy.. I think it’s called apple shape where you’re bigger on top.. small bottom. The purple color is lovely. I wanted something that would be feminine and not look dingy.  Don’t expect the buttery material of the higher end brands. This is a bit pricey for being lower end. It does have Just enough support for the bazoonies and thank heavens it doesn’t pinch or dig anywhere ✅.  If you want a mid quality, good fit, pretty color everyday wear bra.. go for it.  Best of luck! 🌸
Good for running!
Looks good. Wish the pads were sewed in place.
I purchased two other colors of the sports bra and they fit great. For whatever reason this (black) bra fits smaller and is cut shorter under the armpits – – wore my skin raw during my workout.
Comfortable, yet impact supportive and like the color choices.
Super cute AND fits well! Feels like a much pricier product.

I felt this sports bra gives decent support and I love the design on the back to add extra detail. The pads are removable (which I’m not crazy about) BUT they are thick and rounded which I appreciate over the other types of pads out there. If I’m at home I will wear this without the investable pads, and feel supported. For reference I am 5ft, 108lb, 34D.
Fits my body and what God gave me. My man loves it on me, too. Bonus!

I've looked at a ton of sports bras in my life. This one is pretty up there. I run and do HIIT type of work outs and these do the job in terms of coverage and flexibility. I loved it so much I purchased more colors. The colors are also true to the photos. I got a black, orange, the neon yellow. I also got the regular yellow one but I'm not a big fan and it's too late for me to return it. If you're looking for something that's affordable yet functional for high impact work outs, look no further.
Dance team uniform

I am 5’6” and 139lbs and normally wear a small or medium sports bra. I purchased this one in a medium and is painfully small. I had purchased a medium in this exact style/brand last year and it was my favorite sports bra. Either the sizes are very inconsistent or they have changed their sizing. Caution - may need to size up. Otherwise good quality and support.

Love these sports bras, they are comfortable for me.  They have a nice lined padding in the bra that you can take out or leave in.  I have 4-5 of these sports bras and I don’t think any of the inside lining pads have come out in the wash or got crinkled.  So that’s been lucky for me.  The only downfall on the aqua one is I wore it once and now noticed there’s discoloration on the band, almost like my sweat changed the color.  I’m not sure what happened.  Doesn’t bother me since I’m the only one that sees it, just haven’t had that on any other color.
I really like the unique design of this sports bra and especially the cute thin straps.
This bra is so soft and comfortable. I could wear it all day

评论概述: Made well, not the cut I wanted
评论详情: This feels very well made and 100% worth the price.  The only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is because it comes up a little higher in the front than I typically want.  I can see why those with larger chests said this is so great for them!  I'm a bit smaller so the coverage comes up a little above many of my workout tank tops.

Amazon recommended I order a size small. My chest band is 30” and 34” across the widest part of my breasts. I ordered a medium instead and am glad I did. The medium fits just right. The straps are not adjustable, hence removing a star. The straps press on my traps in a slightly uncomfortable way, but not bad enough for me to return the bra.

These sports bras are very comfortable.  I purchased these mainly to wear under tank tops and dresses. For reference, I am a 36 C bra size and usually wear a medium to large in shirts. So I purchased the large and it fit comfortably. I have this sports bra in several different colors and am happy to say all of them wash and wear wonderfully. I wash them on delicate cyle in a mesh bag and hang them to dry.

So, I purchased a black bra in a large with no cutout in the back and it fits perfectly. I purchased a white one in large with the cutout in the back and the seams were popping as I pulled it on. It felt like a size smaller, no kidding. In my humble opinion, the bra with no cutout is accurate in sizing. If you like the one with the cutout, I would size up one. I was bulging a little out of that hole. Not cute. lol. For reference, I wear a 36D. They both seem relatively supportive for a mild workout. I wouldn’t run in these. But I wouldn’t run unless there was someone chasing me with a chainsaw anyway.
I ordered my usual size and had to exchange it for one 2x larger.  It runs very small.  Other than that, it's supportive and great quality.

I will remover the cup forms in this and wear it without or with less thick ones as the lift and padding caused cleavage spillage. I bought the 3XL and wear a 42D bra, for your reference, that was on the edge but other brands fit well in that 3XL size... And I NEED this orange in my life for this dress.

I love these bras. In fact, I bought 4 of them to replace my old, too-tight ones. They are comfortable but still hold everything in place. The padding is not overwhelming but enough to preserve a nice shape and modesty. I cannot speak to the elasticity because I have not had them for too long (so they are nowhere near worn out), but I hand wash these and lay them flat to dry. This seems to preserve the quality even more. In fact, these bras are so good that I cannot believe how inexpensive they are compared to other brands in of equal or less quality. Important to note, this review is coming from the perspective of a smaller busted woman.
Great price and quality is amazing. Nice for high impact sport

Really nice sports bra, the only negative is the cups are removable, which I don’t particularly like. Otherwise it fits well- I ordered medium and I wear 34D bra- it provides very good support for moderate activity.

I have a hard time finding any sort of bra that fits and this one is perfect! I'm a 34D/DD so it's hard to find sports bras that fit my larger boobs without being too loose on the band size and vice versa. I orders a large and was worries it would be too big on the band but it was PERFECT! My DD boob was completely covered in the side and wasn't falling out up top, but also wasn't creating a gap for my D size boob. Very comfortable, and light weight feeling. Will probably by more colors.

This is just slightly too small for my large chest, so I can't use it for exercising or anything, but it works for wearing around my house and being comfortable without an underwire and still feeling supported.

评论概述: Comfy but pads are a little stiff
评论详情: The pads are a little lumpy but still the overall apperance is adorable. Also quite comfortable!

I recently tried this sports bra, and I'm really impressed. It fits perfectly around my torso and provides excellent coverage without any sideboob, which is a huge plus. The band at the bottom is supportive and stays in place during workouts, and the soft material feels great against the skin. It keeps everything secure without feeling restrictive, and the straps are comfortable, making it ideal for longer sessions. Overall, this bra combines functionality and comfort, making it a top choice for my active routine. Highly recommended!  115lbs, 32DD
Love this sports bra! So comfortable and cute! I’m a 34D and it covers nicely and supports perfectly! The cut out on the back adds a sexy touch!

评论概述: Fit and style not for me
评论详情: Not easy to get on, and nearly impossible to get off! Straps too short, and seem like they would not hold up. Nice fabric. Returned

评论概述: Pretty good for the price point, but wouldn't buy it again.
评论详情: The cups were very stiff which isn't a negative exactly, but was different than other sports bras I've owned. It was also slightly too small for me. I bought an xxl and I overflow the top very very slightly the more I move around (I'm 5'6" ~215 lbs and am pretty top heavy.)  Otherwise it looks nice, but I'll stick with bras from target in the future which are in the same price range and have been better quality.
Fits great daughter didn’t love the spaghetti straps but that’s just her preference

As a larger chested woman (36F), it is hard to find bras that work for cute tank tops. The strappy details are cute enough to allow to peek out but this bra is actually supportive. I don't know that it would work as a true sports bra for me. I'm so happy to have found something to wear with cute summer outfits. Going to buy more colors to coordinate since it works as a cute detail. Also looks good under t-shirts where you can't see the back detail.
Super cute and exactly as pictured but not very supportive. I’m usually a 34b and got a medium, probably shouldve gotten a small for more support.

评论概述: Great supportive bra, could be constructed better
评论详情: I’ve used this bra with medium to light use, about 2-3x a week. After about a month, one of the dual straps on the right side is now hanging on by a thread and will need to be repaired and resewn. This was only ever washed on delicate setting in a delicates washer bag. I will be buying more pairs because they are very comfortable and supportive, but buyer beware that you may need to either repair the straps yourself or have a tailor repair it for you. Personally the support and overall quality of these bras will have me buying more, and occasionally repairing a strap is a small but tolerable inconvenience.
